summary:
This is a Saved Game.....
This is for those who waiting for Dragonborn and don\'t want other quests coming in the way..
Almost all quests complete..including Dawnguard
Exceptions-Civil War,Gift,Marriage
descriptionHtml:
The Armor and Weapons he has on him at this point are a bit OP but will even out if you use difficulty mods like Mighty dragons and EROS on Master.
If you don\'t want to do either I suggest throwing throwing armor and weapons away.
Level 82(Its a bug)
100 in all schools
Perks in Archery,Sneak,One Handed,Enchanting and Smithing
Decisions Made
Runa and Lucia Adopted
Atherial Crown Crafted
Parth is still alive
.
.
An Optional file to remove the perks is provided.
All my stuff is in Whiterun along with Lydia and the two Kids.
I also strongly recommend using Cloaks for Skyrim mod..
author: Rao
